attributes.action: reduce the amount of tax levied on Petrol and other fuels to leave the price at no more than 85p a litre in real terms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the government to reduce the amount of tax it charges on top of the purchase of fuel so that the overall amount paid be not more than 85p per litre or equivalent after inflation. Further that the rate of inflation used to calculate these prices should be the lower of the two following figures i) the official rate of inflation using CPI ii) the wage increases granted to public sector employees.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
